summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 36E, page 103 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 1410 East John Street from Lowrise 3 (L3) to Neighborhood Commercial 2 with a 40 foot height limit (NC2/40'). (Petition of Gregory Minaker on behalf of Safeway Corporation, C.F. 301200, Appl. 9601372)
